definition: to say something to someone that expresses praise
details:
verb
- to say something to someone that expresses praise
= synonyms: compliment
- to express congratulations
= example: to express congratulations
= synonyms: felicitate
- to give praise for an achievement
= example: to give praise for an achievement
= synonyms: preen
- to be proud of someone or praise them
= example: to be proud of someone or praise them
= synonyms: pride
